summary: The Cirque du Soleil creation telling the story of Icarus, whose wings melt when he flies to close to the run, sending him crashing into the volcanic and mysterious world of Varekai.
cast: John Gilkey|Octavio Alegria|Alexei Anikine|Kevin Atherton Laprise|Andrew Atherton|Helen Ball|Paul James Bannerman|Roni Bello|Stiv Bello|Cinthia Beranek|Vasyl Besha|Sergiy Bobrovnik|Claudio Carnerio|Mooky Cornish|Michel Cyr|Richard Drouin|Badria Esatia|Serguei Gagarine|Tatiana Gousarova|Wayne Hankin|Vladimir Ignatenkov|Oleg Ivanov|Irina Koliktsionova|Temur Koridze|Mathieu Lavoie|Maxim Levantsevich|Siguang Li|Polina Lymareva|Valentin Menjega|Romech Mourtazov|Raquel Karro Oliveira|Ganna Ostapenko|Oleg Ouchakov|Carmen Piculeata|Olga Pikhienko|Vadim Podoleanu|Brigitte Poudrier|Rodrigue Proteau|Serguei Rissouev|Rafik Samman|Javier Santos Leal|Pedro Santos Leal|Ramon Santos Leal|Susana Defraia Scalas|Valerii Simonenko|Evgueni Tarakanov|Anton Tchelnokov|Zoe Victoria Tedstill|Zara Tellander|Kvicha Tetvadze|Stella Umeh|Serguei Volodine|Andrei Yakovlev|Junping Yang|Igor Zolotoukhine
title: Cirque du Soleil: Varekai
